description: Making relationships more equal at home could have far-reaching effects outside the home. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: Why some women are shunning marriage and giving motherhood a miss
title_page: Why some women are shunning marriage and giving motherhood a miss | The Straits Times
maintext:
Someone asked recently how I was managing work and family, ever since I took on a new job role. My short answer was: “With some difficulty, but it’s doable.”
I’m still trying to find that elusive balance between holding a full-time job and being mother to two children turning eight and three this year.
